content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message from my computer with an example of how to create test cases for the "add" and "subtract" functions in a given code. The command "write_tests" was used with the arguments "code" set to the code for the functions and "focus" set to "add" and "subtract". The example code creates test cases for the functions and returns them as a string.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 732\\ndrwxr-xr-x 3 root root     27 Jun 10 23:10 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   1281 Jun 10 23:08 ai_code.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 710313 Jun 11 01:31 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm     912 Jun 10 18:26 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm    1062 Jun 10 22:24 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    241 Jun 11 00:30 average.py\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    207 Jun 11 00:37 favorite_books.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   1133 Jun 11 01:29 file_logger.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    943 Jun 11 00:28 legal_research_resources.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     76 Jun 11 01:29 my_file.txt\\ndrwxr-xr-x 2 root root      6 Jun 11 00:41 my_folder\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    630 Jun 11 00:31 test_average.py\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result')]
"""
